summary: Normandy is a region in Europe, mainly in France, with a rich history. It got its name from the Vikings, known as "Northmen," who settled there in the 9th century. The region includes mainland France and the Channel Islands, which are British territories. Normandy has a population of over 3 million and is known for its historic Duchy, which was ruled by the same person as the King of England for a time. Important cities include Rouen and Caen.
title: Normandy
